underlying_goal: Implement a Databricks notebook development skill and integrate ruff linting into CI via Taskfile and GitHub Actions
friction_detail: CI failed because aquaproj/aqua-installer@v4 major version tag didn't exist, requiring a fix to pin to a specific commit SHA.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a multi-phase plan for Databricks notebook skills and ruff linting CI; Claude delegated to teammates, completed all phases, created a PR, and fixed a CI failure caused by a non-existent action version tag.
